subject: Personal Finance
title: Commitment Devices
description: Learn Commitment Devices in one minute.

hook.text: Odysseus tied himself to the mast to resist the Sirens. You can tie yourself to a savings plan.

buildup.text: Commitment devices are self-imposed constraints that help you stick to long-term goals.

discovery.text: Automatic payroll deductions, locked savings accounts, and penalty clauses all serve this purpose.

twist.text: The key insight: your present self sets rules that your future self can't easily break.

climax.text: Studies show people who use commitment devices save 81% more than those who rely on willpower alone.

punchline.text: Bind your future self to smart choices now.

quiz.question: What is a commitment device?
options: A self-imposed rule that helps you stick to goals
A financial product sold by banks
